Onboarding.title: Stroke App
Onboarding.subtitle: A warm welcome!
Onboarding.welcome:
Great choice!

I am happy to accompany you as your digital coach.
Onboarding.checkQrUsageSubtitle: How do you want to proceed?

participantInformations.name: Name
participantInformations.type: Can you type on a phone?

Badges.firstC: Congrats ! You completed your first session
Badges.secondC: Congrats! you completed your first day of coaching
Badges.thirdC: Congrats ! You completed 3 days of training in a row
Badges.fourthC: Congrats! you completed 5 days of training in a row
Badges.fifthC: Congrats! you completed your first training by yourself
Badges.second: Complete your first day of coaching
Badges.fifth: Complete your first training session with the I want to train button

Exercises.title: Here you will find the exercises proposed by your therapist

Chat.title: Chat with {{coach}}
Chat.emptyChatMessage: This is a empty chat message.

ConnectionStates.offlineNotice:
To reach your coach,
you need an internet connection.
ConnectionStates.initialized: There is currently no connection to the coach. As soon as you have an active internet connection again, the connection will be re-established.
ConnectionStates.connecting: Connection to the coach in progress...
ConnectionStates.connected: It checks what's happened since the last connection to the coach...

gridMenu.seeYou: Happy to see you again! Here's your daily schedule
gridMenu.session: You already have a session in progress with the coach

checklist.title: These are your goals for the day
checklist.learningNext: The next learning session with is set at
checklist.trainingNext: The next training session with is set at
checklist.learningDone: Congratulations! You have attended today's learning session
checklist.trainingDone: Congratulations! You attended today's training session

feedbackForm.title: Feedback
feedbackForm.submitMessage: Thanks. Your feedback helps us to further improve the app.
